hero.title: Manifest369 - The Magic Power of Making Dreams Come True
hero.subtitle: Smart manifestation app based on Tesla's 369 method
hero.description: Systematically achieve your desired goals through the scientific 369 method. Daily practice of writing 3, 6, 9 times to let the universe's energy help you manifest your dreams.

about.title: About the Founder
about.subtitle: Tech-driven manifestation practitioner
about.description: I'm Wang Haisheng, a full-stack developer and practitioner of the Manifest369 method. By combining technology with spiritual growth, I created this app to help people achieve their dreams.

list.name: John Smith
list.content: After using Manifest369 for three months, I successfully secured the investment opportunity I desired. This app made my manifestation practice more systematic.

list.name: Sarah Johnson
list.content: Daily 369 practice helped me focus more on my goals, with significant improvements in both work and life.

list.name: Mike Chen
list.content: Simple interface, powerful reminder features - helped me maintain 100 days of manifestation practice!

support.title: Support Us

support.description: Manifest369 is completely free to use. If this app has helped you, please support our continued development through:
support.thanks: Thank you for your support in helping more people benefit from the power of manifestation!
